testcase.name: Successful Login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Swag Labs login page......................................passed When I enter the username "standard_user"...................................passed And I enter the password "secret_sauce".....................................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed Then I should be taken to the products page.................................passed

testcase.name: Wrong Password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Swag Labs login page......................................passed When I enter the username "standard_user"...................................passed And I enter the password "wrong_password"...................................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed Then I should see an error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed
